CHAT.comment: The tone of the conversation is friendly during this activity. In the beginning , MOT brings up how magnets can destroy tapes and the television set. Soon afterward , a conversation surrounding the purpose of the flat silver circle emerges , and Chi gives an explanation for how it works which isn't quite correct. Mot asks several questions about how things work. Towards the end of the activity Chi brings in his own magnet set , and Mot and Chi play with both sets. EXP remains in the background of the talk. Video taping does not start until later; transcription until then is solely from audio

u.a: talking about setting up the camera and the amount of time for activity .
looks in a large plastic bag to see what's inside
videotape starts here
MOT and Chi are on one side of a coffee table; Mot sits on the couch and Chi kneels on the floor
takes the box of magnets out of the plastic bag
talks about camera
a plastic box containing the silver pieces and magnets is attached to the black base; Mot and Chi pull the box and the base magnet apart

g.ga: silver circle on black base , maybe

u.a: dumps the yellow wand onto the coffee table; it makes a loud noise
a silver man stands on the black base with a washer on its head
voice raises to scream on last word
Chi is arranging the silver men , washers and nuts on the black base; Mot helps; Chi screams at the end because a silver man fell
moves to place a nut on a silver man's head
refers to a nut which rests on the silver man's head while the man remains standing
places a washer on top of the nut
touches the objects on the black base with a silver stick
MOT may be referring to the silver stick when she says wands
the stick falls out of Mot's hands
puts the silver stick through the hole in the washer and nut
two of the silver men on the base fell as a result of Mot's actions
newscaster voice
picks up a silver stick from the table
lays the silver stick across the tops of a washer and a nut which rest on two silver men on the black base , and then puts a silver man on top of the stick; one of the silver men on the base falls
removes the sticks from the silver men and puts them aside
lays a silver stick across the shoulders of two silver men
lays another silver stick across the other shoulders of the two silver men; the formation now looks like parallel bars
camera moves as EXP finds a better position from which to watch

g.ga: on the table with the magnets

u.a: places a silver man upside down on the <parallel bars>
refers to the act described above
places another silver man , standing upright , on top of the other silver man which is on the parallel bars

g.ga: Mot's structure of one silver man and four nuts and washers

u.a: removes a nut from the top of the silver man
Chi actually waits to see if it is okay to take the nut from a structure which Mot has made before he actually takes it
places the red ball on the black base where Chi is building his structure
places a third silver man on top of the other two which are on the <parallel bars>
places the red ball on one of the silver sticks
picks up the yellow wand
the stack of three silver men falls because Mot put the yellow wand close to them
takes the yellow wand from Mot
puts the yellow wand close to the red ball; the red ball rolls over the silver stick and falls down onto the base
moves the red ball with the yellow wand
lifts a silver stick off one of the silver man's shoulders; it stands up straight and attaches to the yellow wand , then the stick falls
lifts the second silver stick; the same process as described above occurs
MOT is quiet; Chi sets down the yellow wand and picks up a washer
puts a washer over a silver stick which Mot holds perpendicular to the base
is unable to make the washer go over the stick
turns to face the couch , which is behind Chi , and burries his face in the pillow
tries to get a washer to stand on its side on the black base
turns around to face coffee table again
removes the flat silver circle , and all pieces on top of it , from the base
taps the black base with index finger
tries to make a silver man stand on the black base , now without the flat silver circle on top of it; the silver man falls flat
tries to pick up a silver man from the table

g.ga: perhaps the magnetic force of the black base

u.a: tries to stand a silver man up on the base

g.ga: black base , without the flat circle

u.a: places the flat silver circle on the black base
prepares to place a silver man on the base
turns the flat silver circle over
stands a silver man on the base , which has the flat circle on top
stands another silver man on the base , and knocks down the first one Chi stood up
re-positions the fallen silver man to standing
Chi has rearranged two silver men so that they're back to holding two silver sticks like parallel bars
places a washer across the two silver sticks and then pulls it off
places thin round magnet across the silver sticks
places the red ball on top of the thin round magnet
Chi was going to put something other than the red ball on top of the thin round magnet , but Mot put the ball there first before Chi could put an object on the thin magnet
removes the red ball
places a silver man on top of the thin magnet; it doesn't remain standing
<$=2> mimicks Mot
repositions the silver man on the thin magnet so that it will stand; the silver man stands briefly and then is pulled down (attracted) to the black base
removes the magnet from the two silver sticks
places the magnet back on the two silver sticks and tries to stand a washer on the thin magnet
frustration
removes the thin round magnet from the two silver sticks
sits back up
whispered
positions a silver man in a handstand on the two silver sticks
places another man in a handstand on the silver sticks
places another silver man on top of the two which are doing handstands
whispered
leaves the room
MOT and EXP discuss powdered iron ore and its effect on computers and vcr's while Chi has gone to his room to get his magnet set; Mot plays with the magnets while she talks to EXP
Chi returns to the play area
Chi refers to Mot's arrangement of the magnents on the black base
places his black base on the table
the <Omni Theater> is a special kind of movie theater

g.ga: zoom in and out with the camera

u.a: hands his black base to Mot
wipes Chi's base on her pants leg to clean it
touches Mot's arrangement on EXP's black base
clears Mot's arrangement from the black base
stands several silver men on his black base
places the flat silver circle from the EXP's base on top of the silver men
places silver men on top of the second flat silver circle

g.ga: another flat silver circle to make another tier

u.a: places the two silver sticks on top of the silver men which stand on the second level
removes the two silver sticks from the top of the structure
sighs
under breath
places a paper clip on top of the structure
removes washers and a paper clip from the silver men which are on top

it seems that Mot has been putting the washers and the paper clip on the silver men and then Chi , slightly annoyed , removes them; however , the video only showed Mot placing the paper clip on the structure , not the washers
exasperated
repositions a silver man that had been moved while he was removing a washer , and knocks another silver man off the second level in the process

g.ga: on the second level flat silver circle

u.a: two silver men were knocked down by Chi when Mot reached across the structure
moves one of the silver men on the top level , it falls
defeated
stands four silver men on top of the second flat silver circle
a silver man falls
a silver man falls while Chi is repositioning another silver man
places silver sticks on top of the silver men
whispered .
shrugs shoulders and lifts up hands
places two silver men on top of the silver sticks
whispered
a silver man falls
picks up two silver sticks
places the two silver sticks on top of the top two silver men , making a fourth level
places the red ball on top of the two top silver sticks
removes the red ball from the top and hands it to Mot
picks up a silver man from the table , makes a move to place it on top of the tower
successfully places the last silver man on top of the tower

g.ga: placing the red ball on top

u.a: tries to place the red ball on top of the highest silver man , but the silver man falls
places silver man back on top of the tower
tries to place another object , which isn't visible on the video , on top of the silver man , but the silver man falls
lifts up the fallen silver man
holds the silver man in the air
MOT stacks objects on top of the tower
wiggles the flat silver circle slightly; the top two levels of the tower fall
knocks over another level of the tower; only one level remains
EXP
<The Planets> is a piece of music written by Holst
MOT , INV , and Chi talk about music and musical tastes , while Mot continues to stack magnets
